abstract: Cellphone numbers are not legally regulated like Social Security numbers, yet they are increasingly used as link to private information maintained by variety of companies, including money lenders and social networks; sensitive nature of cell numbers, which can provide information about purchase habits or be used in identity theft, is growing issue for young people.
lead_paragraph: A mobile number can be even more valuable than a Social Security number, since it’s tied to so many databases and connected to a device you carry with you.
snippet: A mobile number can be even more valuable than a Social Security number, since it’s tied to so many databases and connected to a device you carry with you....

headline.main: A 10-Digit Key Code to Your Private Life: Your Cellphone Number
headline.print_headline: Your Trusty Cellphone Number: 10-Digit Code to Trove of Secrets
